rstansensitivity 0.0.1.0
  • Reference

Get the filename of the stan model to be used for sampling.

GetSamplingModelFilename.Rd

Get the filename of the stan model to be used for sampling.

GetSamplingModelFilename(model_name)

Arguments

model_name

A full path to the base model name. For example, if the model with the hyperparameter block is named /home/user/my_model.stan, set model_name should be equal to "/home/user/my_model"

Value

The full path of the generated file to be used for sampling.

Examples

library(devtools)
library(rstan)
rstan_options(auto_write=TRUE)

model_filename <- package_file("inst/examples/my_model.stan")
stan_data_filename <- package_file("inst/examples/my_model.data.R")

# Parse the hyperparameters block of `my_model.stan` into models that
# Stan can actuall compile.
model_name <- GenerateSensitivityFromModel(model_filename)
model <- stan_model(GetSamplingModelFilename(model_name))

# Get the original samples.
stan_data <- LoadStanData(stan_data_filename)
sampling_result <- sampling(model, data=stan_data, chains=1, iter=1000)
#> 
#> SAMPLING FOR MODEL 'my_model_generated' NOW (CHAIN 1).
#> Chain 1: 
#> Chain 1: Gradient evaluation took 6e-06 seconds
#> Chain 1: 1000 transitions using 10 leapfrog steps per transition would take 0.06 seconds.
#> Chain 1: Adjust your expectations accordingly!
#> Chain 1: 
#> Chain 1: 
#> Chain 1: Iteration:   1 / 1000 [  0%]  (Warmup)
#> Chain 1: Iteration: 100 / 1000 [ 10%]  (Warmup)
#> Chain 1: Iteration: 200 / 1000 [ 20%]  (Warmup)
#> Chain 1: Iteration: 300 / 1000 [ 30%]  (Warmup)
#> Chain 1: Iteration: 400 / 1000 [ 40%]  (Warmup)
#> Chain 1: Iteration: 500 / 1000 [ 50%]  (Warmup)
#> Chain 1: Iteration: 501 / 1000 [ 50%]  (Sampling)
#> Chain 1: Iteration: 600 / 1000 [ 60%]  (Sampling)
#> Chain 1: Iteration: 700 / 1000 [ 70%]  (Sampling)
#> Chain 1: Iteration: 800 / 1000 [ 80%]  (Sampling)
#> Chain 1: Iteration: 900 / 1000 [ 90%]  (Sampling)
#> Chain 1: Iteration: 1000 / 1000 [100%]  (Sampling)
#> Chain 1: 
#> Chain 1:  Elapsed Time: 0.004077 seconds (Warm-up)
#> Chain 1:                0.003783 seconds (Sampling)
#> Chain 1:                0.00786 seconds (Total)
#> Chain 1: 

# Get the sensitivity result.
stan_sensitivity_list <- GetStanSensitivityModel(model_name, stan_data)
#> 
#> SAMPLING FOR MODEL 'my_model_sensitivity_parameters' NOW (CHAIN 1).
#> Chain 1: Iteration: 1 / 1 [100%]  (Sampling)
#> Chain 1: 
#> Chain 1:  Elapsed Time: 0 seconds (Warm-up)
#> Chain 1:                1.2e-05 seconds (Sampling)
#> Chain 1:                1.2e-05 seconds (Total)
#> Chain 1: 
#> 
#> SAMPLING FOR MODEL 'my_model_generated' NOW (CHAIN 1).
#> Chain 1: Iteration: 1 / 1 [100%]  (Sampling)
#> Chain 1: 
#> Chain 1:  Elapsed Time: 0 seconds (Warm-up)
#> Chain 1:                1e-05 seconds (Sampling)
#> Chain 1:                1e-05 seconds (Total)
#> Chain 1: 
#> 
#> SAMPLING FOR MODEL 'my_model_sensitivity' NOW (CHAIN 1).
#> Chain 1: Iteration: 1 / 1 [100%]  (Sampling)
#> Chain 1: 
#> Chain 1:  Elapsed Time: 0 seconds (Warm-up)
#> Chain 1:                1.1e-05 seconds (Sampling)
#> Chain 1:                1.1e-05 seconds (Total)
#> Chain 1: 
sens_result <- GetStanSensitivityFromModelFit(
    sampling_result, stan_sensitivity_list)
#> Evaluating model at the MCMC draws for chain  1 .
#>

print(sens_result$sens_mat)
#>                   mu       lp__
#> prior_mean 0.4881157 -0.0299421
print(sens_result$sens_mat_normalized)
#>                   mu        lp__
#> prior_mean 0.5839721 -0.03707056
